QAs.question: Is this convertible
Does it auto connect to home inverter after power cut?
QAs.answer: A refrigerator works on whatever  power supply it's connected to. Your inverter connection should be wired by your electrician such  that it can feed the concerned power points when main supply goes off. It's a very easy work for any electrician.

QAs.question: After power cut, cooling remains for how long?
QAs.answer: That'll depend upon how many times you open the freezer door.. during no power supply situation ... according to common experience, if the refrigerator door is not opened for more than once or twice, when there's no power and not more than 5-10 seconds on each occasion, reasonable coolness can be preserved  for several hours.

QAs.question: How much power it consumes when on home inverter?
QAs.answer: The refrigerator will consume same  power  from inverter as it cosumes from mains supply.. however depending on your inverter efficient, net power consumed by the refrigerator plus inverter will be definitely higher than when the refrigerator works directly from main commercial supply

QAs.question: Can it auto connect to inverter?
